Name: Neon Breaker
About the game: Relax to the chaos of this new take on a classic experience. Features Bricks that break. Balls, lots of balls (They break bricks). Power ups (They might break bricks). Full level editor and a bonus 100% extra sarcasm included in the base price. Drops Controls Next on the Roadmap: Individual High Scores for each level set Integrate level editor with Steam Workshop Add more power ups Localizations and more ...
